name: Château Margaux 2015
description: A powerful and elegant wine with notes of blackcurrant, violet, and cedar. The 2015 vintage is considered one of the best in recent years.

name: Domaine de la Romanée-Conti 2018
description: An exceptional wine with incredible complexity and depth. Aromas of red fruit, spice, and earth lead to a long, silky finish.

name: Screaming Eagle Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
description: A cult classic from Napa Valley. This wine is rich and opulent, with layers of dark fruit, mocha, and graphite.
